::: {#hero-heading}

I am a researcher in **environmental physiology** with a strong commitment to assessing the impacts of **climate change** on human health. My research explores how the human body responds to heat exposure and extreme temperatures, as well as potential heat adaptation strategies to ensure livability for future generations.  

Beyond the lab, I’m passionate about **science communication and popularization**. Through my blog, I simplify scientific articles and methods used in the field of climate and health for both researchers and the general public, aiming to make research **clear, visual, and actionable**.

[Learn more about me →](/about){.about-links .subtitle}
:::
